mapper.select: select courseNo, courseName, teacher.teacherNo, teacher.teacherName, courseGrade, courseTime from course, teacher where course.teacherNo = teacher.teacherNo
mapper.insert:
select if(max(courseNo) is null, 100001, max(courseNo) + 1) as newId from course
insert into course (courseNo,courseName,teacherNo,courseGrade,courseTime) value(#{courseNo},#{courseName},#{teacherNo},#{courseGrade},#{courseTime})
